name: Cresselia LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Full Moon Dance
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from either player’s Pokémon to another Pokémon (yours or your opponent’s). This power can’t be used if Cresselia is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Moon Skip
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out by this attack, take 1 more Prize card.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Cresselia. Cresselia LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
